channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HADOOP-12022] fix site -Pdocs -Pdist in hadoop-project-dist; cleanout remaining forrest bits
item.description: Between HDFS-8350 and probably other changes, it would appear site -Pdocs -Pdist no longer works and is breaking the nightly build.
item.summary: fix site -Pdocs -Pdist in hadoop-project-dist; cleanout remaining forrest bits

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
-00:

  • Remove all of the deprecated forrest stuff
  • Remove release notes and changes bits since those were replaced by releasedocmaker
  • Remove remaining references to src/main/docs

-1 overall

-01:

  • different format

fwiw, running:

 mvn clean verify -Drequire.test.libhadoop -Pdist -Pnative -Dtar -Pdocs -fae -DskipTests

in hadoop-hdfs-project simulates the problem.

-1 overall

I ran {{ mvn clean site -Preleasedocs; mvn site:stage -DstagingDirectory=/tmp/hadoop-site }} and checked that the documentation produced didn't reference any of the files that were deleted.
Patch looks good to me. +1.
Thanks for the review. Committed!
